hero.title: Predict
hero.description: Use our advanced AI to predict and analyze potential exoplanets in the universe. Discover new worlds with cutting-edge technology.

header.title: About
header.subtitle: Exploring the universe with artificial intelligence to discover new worlds

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: EXOD-IA is an innovative project that combines the power of artificial intelligence with astronomical data from the Kepler, K2, and TESS missions to identify and classify exoplanets.
mission.description2: Our goal is to democratize exoplanet discovery, allowing researchers and enthusiasts to access advanced analysis in an intuitive and visual way.

technology.title: Technology
technology.description: We used the Random Forest algorithm trained with +15,000 records of transiting exoplanets to detect classification patterns.

feature1.title: Accurate Analysis
feature1.description: Accuracy above 72% in the classification of confirmed exoplanets, planetary candidates, and false positives.

feature2.title: Intuitive Visualization
feature2.description: Interactive star maps and detailed light curve graphs

feature3.title: Real Data
feature3.description: Updated information from Kepler, K2, and TESS missions provided by NASA.

item1.title: Scientific Accessibility
item1.description: We facilitate access to advanced analysis tools for students, researchers, and astronomy enthusiasts.

item2.title: Education and Inspiration
item2.description: We inspire the next generation of scientists by showing how AI can revolutionize astronomy.

item3.title: Collaborative Discovery
item3.description: We promote collaboration between citizen scientists and professionals in discovering new worlds.

item4.title: Technological Innovation
item4.description: We demonstrate the power of artificial intelligence applied to space exploration and big data analysis.

header.title: Cosmos Explorers
header.subtitle: A multidisciplinary team of Computer Systems, Mechatronics, and Mechanical Engineering united by the passion to discover new worlds beyond our solar system.

member1.name: Alfredo Barranco Ahued
